channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Apex board - outside 225 Village Way, 9th June
item.description:
I have tried to contact the company throughout May & emailed twice and phoned them with no response - please remove apex board outside 225 Village Way - please place in the stores for a couple of weeks - thanks N05

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Village Way, Beckenham, London

item.title: Flytip, 9th June
item.description:
A huge fly tip has appeared in the space in front of unusable garages at the junction between Whitworth/Herbert Road SE18. This is adjacent to a public pavement and as such is a council responsibility. This fly tip is likely to cause a public health problem and is also a fire risk. Many children use this route to school and it’s a terrible example to them. This was previously a recurring problem but hasn’t been for a little while since the council either encouraged the owner to clear the site or did it themselves. It’s a pity the garages can’t be demolished, it would provide a space for a dwelling instead of causing nuisance.

Report on FixMyStreet
